patch.comment: Update lodash.

minor.comment: Include an option to strip comments from produced JS files in the TSC task.

patch.comment: Fix an issue where the TscTask and TslintTasks where invoking the wrong version of Node.js
Fix an issue where "spawnSync" may not be able to resolve node.

minor.comment: Inclusion of three new tasks designed to use as minimal behavior as possible to run tsc, tslint, and api-extractor.

patch.comment: Fixed mutation on tsConfigFile resulting in tslint error
Fix logging warnings in TypeScript config
Expose three more api-extractor config parameters in gulp-core-build-typescript

minor.comment: For the API Extractor task config file, the "generatePackageTypings" setting was renamed to "generateDtsRollup"
Add a new GCB option dtsRollupTrimming which corresponds to the new "trimming" flag for API Extractor
Add a `libESNextFolder` option

patch.comment: Fix an issue where the column number for typescript errors was off by one
Update gulp-sourcemaps.
Fix an issue where the line number for typescript errors were off by one.
Force a patch bump in case the previous version was an empty package
Add some missing @types dependencies to the package.json
Upgrade api-extractor library
Remove deprecated tslint rule "typeof-compare"

minor.author: Ian Clanton-Thuon <iclanton@users.noreply.github.com>
minor.comment: Upgrade TSLint and tslint-microsoft-contrib.

minor.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
minor.comment: Add a new setting "generatePackageTypings" for the API Extractor task

minor.author: Nicholas Pape <nickpape-msft@users.noreply.github.com>
minor.comment: Upgrade to Node 8

patch.author: Nicholas Pape <nickpape-msft@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Get web-build-tools building with pnpm

minor.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
minor.comment: The ApiExtractor task now expects *.d.ts files instead of *.ts, but includes a compatibility workaround for the common case of src/index.ts

minor.author: Ian Clanton-Thuon <iclanton@users.noreply.github.com>
minor.comment: Allow the TS task's configuration to be extended on an instance-by-instance basis.

patch.author: QZ <qz2017@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: lock the reference version between web build tools projects

patch.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Upgrade cyclic dependencies

patch.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Updated cyclic dependencies

patch.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Updated to use simplified api-extractor interface

patch.author: Ian Clanton-Thuon <iclanton@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Fix an error message when the "module" property is set to esnext.

minor.author: Nick Pape <nickpape@users.noreply.github.com>
minor.comment: Upgrade to es6

minor.author: Ian Clanton-Thuon <iclanton@users.noreply.github.com>
minor.comment: Support ESNext module output format and allow a base TypeScript configuration to be set by a build rig.

patch.author: Nick Pape <nickpape@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Deprecate @types/es6-coll ections in favor of built-in typescript typings 'es2015.collection' a nd 'es2015.iterable'

patch.author: Nick Pape <nickpape@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Add $schema field to all schemas

major.comment: Fix compatibility issues with old releases, by incrementing the major version number

minor.comment: Upgrade to tslint 5.6.0

patch.comment: Publish

minor.comment: Include the no-unused-variable TSLint rule to bring back the "no-unused-import" functionality. Remove no-unused-parameters default TSConfig option to be consistent with the TSLint no-unused-variable behavior.

patch.comment: Force a patch bump to ensure everything is published
Upgrade to the TS2.4 version of the build tools.

minor.comment: Upgrade to TypeScript 2.4
Enable StrictNullChecks.

patch.comment: Add missing API Extractor release tags
Upgraded api-extractor dependency
Fix issue where TypeScriptTask did not allow you to set a target other than "commonjs"
Bugfix: Update TypeScriptConfiguration to allow setting a custom version of typescript compiler.

minor.comment: Adding `libES6Dir` setting to taskConfig to optionally output es6 modules.

patch.comment: Remove ES6 Promise & @types/es6-promise typings
API Extractor now uses Gulp-Typescript to generate compiler options.
Adjusted the version specifier for typescript to ~2.2.2
Fixing the way the TSLint task is configured to allow removal of existing rules.
Reverting change.

minor.comment: Updating typescript, gulp-typescript, and tslint.
Write the TSLint configuration file after executing the task.

patch.comment: Locking `@types` packages. Synchronizing version specifiers for dependencies with other `web-build-tools` projects.
Make loadSchema public instead of protected.
Introduce schema for TsLintTask, TypeScriptTask
Added external json docs loading before analyzing API
Added external-api-json folder with external types definitions. Added gulp task to run ApiExtractor on external types defintions.
Updating the tsconfig to give compiler options as enums.

minor.comment: Refactor the API-Extractor to use the same config as the TypeScriptTask

patch.comment: Add a schema for the api-extractor task and change the name.

minor.comment: Adding an API Extractor task.

patch.comment: Fixing TSLint task by removing some deprecated rules ("label-undefined”, "no-duplicate-key", and "no-unreachable") and setting the "noUnusedParameters" and "noUnusedLocals" TS compiler options to cover the deprecated "no-unused-variable".
